typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{MeterPoint Code} as string,
		{Serial Number} as string,
		{Plant Code} as string,
		{Date/Time} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		{Data Type} as string,
		{Data Value} as double,
		Units as string,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	dateFormats: ['dd-MM-yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy']) ~> source1
source(output(
		{MeterPoint Code} as string,
		{Serial Number} as string,
		{Plant Code} as string,
		{Date/Time} as date,
		{Data Type} as string,
		{Data Value} as double,
		Units as string,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source2
source1 select(mapColumn(
		{MeterPoint Code},
		{Date/Time},
		{Data Type},
		{Data Value}
	)) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy({Date/Time},
		{MeterPoint Code},
		{Data Type}),
	{Average Value} = avg({Data Value})) ~> Aggregate1
source2 select(mapColumn(
		MeterPoint_Code_Alias = {MeterPoint Code},
		Date_Alias = {Date/Time},
		{Data Type},
		{Data Value}
	)) ~> Select2
Aggregate1, Select2 join({Date/Time} == Date_Alias,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	dateFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy',
	timestampFormat:'dd/MM/yyyy') ~> sink1
